attributes.action: Deport All Foreign Criminals Back To Their Home Countries.
attributes.additional_details: The reason I would like the government to do this is because it is a good way to free up prison spaces for the most dangerous UK criminals and would also relive alot of pressure in the UK prison system and reduce stress level of prison staff also this would save the tax payer millions each year.
attributes.background:
As you are aware the UK prison population Is one of the highest In europe, I belive one way to cope with this would be to deport all foreign criminals convicted of a crime in the UK back to their home countries, also any foreign criminal in a UK prison 
should be deported.

rejection.details:
With a few exceptions, foreign criminals who commit serious offences must already be deported, so we're not sure what else you'd like to happen.

You can find out more here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-8062/
